DOC.brief_summary: A study investigate effect GW679769 sleep cognition . Potential subject participate clinical screen visit two-night PSG recording session sleep laboratory . Eligible subject participate three separate two-night PSG session randomize receive placebo one two dos GW679769 60 minute prior bedtime , one treatment session balance order . Each treatment session separate two-week drug-free period occur day week . A safety follow-up visit occur 2 week last treatment session .
